So the Tapas were good here.  We tried a bunch of toothpick tapas places while we were in Spain, and this was near the top on quality food for the price.  But the service was a bit lacking.  What a love about Spain is that the food is awesome + the service is usually also very very good.  They were not bad, but I don't think they were going out of there way to be friendly.  And that might sound a bit spoiled, but hey - I got a lot of good service in Spain.
